solution_line_template: If there are {num_rows} rows of flowers with {flowers_per_row} flowers per row, there are {num_rows}*{flowers_per_row} = <<{num_rows}*{flowers_per_row}={total_flowers_initial}>>{total_flowers_initial} flowers in the garden,
Mr. Wells cuts flowers from {cut_percentage} of the flowers, which is {cut_percentage}*{total_flowers_initial} = <<{cut_percentage}*{total_flowers_initial}={flowers_cut}>>{flowers_cut} flowers.
The total number of flowers remaining in the garden is {total_flowers_initial}-{flowers_cut} = <<{total_flowers_initial}-{flowers_cut}={flowers_remaining}>>{flowers_remaining}
